subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Cycling, Road
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins, the race leader, left his rivals behind as he climbed to the Stage 17 finish in Peyragudes, effectively securing his first Tour de France title.
snippet: Bradley Wiggins, the race leader, left his rivals behind as he climbed to the Stage 17 finish in Peyragudes, effectively securing his first Tour de France title.
